    public class TooltipPopup
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupPanel
    A widget-based tooltip popup.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TooltipPopup

        public TooltipPopup(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget sender,
                    int relLeft,
                    int relTop,
                    java.lang.String text,
                    boolean useRelTop)
        Creates a new Tool Tip with the default show delay and no auto hiding
        Parameters:
        sender - The widget to create the tool tip for
        relLeft - The left offset from the sender
        relTop - The top offset from the sender
        text - The tool tip text to display
        useRelTop - If true, then use the relative top offset. If not, then just use the sender's offset height.

      • TooltipPopup

        public TooltipPopup(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget sender,
                    int relLeft,
                    int relTop,
                    java.lang.String text,
                    boolean useRelTop,
                    int showDelay,
                    int hideDelay,
                    java.lang.String styleName)
        Creates a new Tool Tip
        Parameters:
        sender - The widget to create the tool tip for
        relLeft - The left offset from the sender
        relTop - The top offset from the sender
        text - The tool tip text to display
        useRelTop - If true, then use the relative top offset. If not, then just use the senders offset height.
        showDelay - The delay, in milliseconds, before the popup is displayed
        hideDelay - The delay, in milliseconds, before the popup is hidden
        styleName - The style name to apply to the popup
